# MTLHeapType.automatic

**Case**

A heap that automatically places new resource allocations.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

In an automatic heap, Metal automatically determines the locations of resources allocated by the heap, with a layout specific to the GPU. Automatic heaps may perform better than manually placing resources in the heap ([doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeapType/placement]).

Use automatic heaps when the heap primarily contains temporary resources that you write to often.

## Specifying the heap type

- **MTLHeapType.placement**: The app controls placement of resources on the heap.
- **MTLHeapType.sparse**: The heap contains sparse texture tiles.
